text: chort prykrasyv yikhni pratsi u yikhnikh ochakh, ta skazav, "Vy ne mozhete buty zavdavatysya porazky budʹ-yakymy lyudʹmy sʹohodni," ta "ya budu borotysʹ razom z vamy." Ale yak tilʹky dva armiyi zustrichavsya z odyn odnoho, vin povernuvsya nazad na yoho p'yatakh ta fled, kazhuchy, "ya zrikayusya vas. YA bachu yaki vy ne dyvytesʹ. Na zhalʹ BOHA. BOZHYY retribution awesome
